classes.name: Archer
classes.description: A range combat expert who excels with bows, specialising in precision attacks from a distance and agility to avoid melee threats

classes.name: Mage
classes.description: A spellcaster who harnesses magic to manipulate the elements, cast devastating offensive spells or provide magical support through healing utility spells

classes.name: Sage
classes.description: A jack-of-all-trades magician who is capable of wielding multiple elements and skills, capable of casting offensive, defensive, and support magic at once

classes.name: Warrior
classes.description: A heavily-armoured frontline combatant with exceptional strength and endurance, skilled in melee weapons and capable of soaking up damage to protect allies.

classes.name: Rogue
classes.description: A stealthy and agile class, adept at sneaking, lockpicking, and using daggers or short swords to deliver critical hits or set traps for enemies.

classes.name: Cleric
classes.description: A divine healer and protector, capable of mending wounds, curing ailments, and using holy magic to smite enemies or ward off undead threats.

classes.name: Paladin
classes.description: A holy knight who combines martial prowess with divine spells, acting as both a capable warrior and a healer, often bound by a strict code of honour.

classes.name: Alchemist
classes.description: A scientist that utilises potions and magic to blend a concoction of reactions, able to perform all tasks in combat with a multitude of effects.
